articles.title: More Deaths, No Benefit from Malaria Drug in VA Virus Study - Snopes.com
articles.description: A malaria drug widely touted by President Donald Trump for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals.
